Title: Snow
Writer: Aida Begic (idea), Aida Begic, Faruk Sabanovic (idea), Elma Tataragic, NoÃ©mie de Lapparent (collaboration in script)
Actors: Zana Marjanovic, Jasna Beri, Sadzida Setic, Vesna Masic
Plot: Post traumatic life of the Bosnian Muslim widows and daughters after their husbands and fathers were murdered by Bosnian Serb Army. Plot is set in post war eastern Bosnian village near town of Zvornik.
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Germany, France, Iran
